## Component 1001 - Richtext
This basic component fits many needs of simple web pages. It offers headlines, formatted text, images and links.

phenotype.script: set("_revision",1); } public function initForm($context) { // Customize input form with form_xy-methods $_options = Array(0=>"Standard",2=>"Box"); $this->form_selectbox("Style","style",$_options); $this->form_textfield("Headline","headline",300); $this->form_image_selector("","image1","",true,0,0,0,array("altandalign"=>true)); $this->form_richtext("","text",405,15); $this->form_link("","link"); } public function render($context) { // Initialize template access (=>$mySmarty) eval ($this->initRendering()); $template = $TPL_DEFAULT; switch ($this->get("image1_align")) { case "right": $class = "imageright"; break; case "center": $class = "imagecenter"; break; default: $class = "imageleft"; break; } if ($this->getI("image1_img_id")!=0) { $myImg = new PhenotypeImage($this->get("image1_img_id")); $myImg->class = $class; $mySmarty->assign("image",$myImg->render($this->get("image1_alt"))); } $mySmarty->assign("headline",$this->get("headline")); $mySmarty->assign("text",$this->get("text")); $mySmarty->assign("id",$this->id); if ($this->get("link_url")!="") { $link = ' '.$this->get("link_name").''; $a= ''; $aa = ''; } else { $link=""; $a=""; $aa=""; } $mySmarty->assign("a",$a); $mySmarty->assign("aa",$aa); $mySmarty->assign("link",$link); if ($this->getI("style")==2) { $mySmarty->assign("box",true); } else { $mySmarty->assign("box",false); } return $mySmarty->fetch($template); } public function setFullSearch() { $s = $this->get("headline") .
